channel.title: Client+mac
channel.description:
Hi, I have a client, but i need it to be accesable for mac users also, I keep getting yelled at to get on it, but i cant seem to find any1 with the same problem. If some1 would please tell me if this something simple, or complex. and if you can help in anyway the would be great!
also in the smallers not so needed things, i would LOVE to have a webclient. people say its easy but i cant figure it out. I already know a free ASP hoster, but cant figure it out.
Any answeres would be appreciated
